description:
{"blocks":[{"key":"40bpl","text":"
Sexual abuse of children is an important issue with severe consequences,
 so self-care education programs increase children's awareness, 
knowledge, and skills against sexual abuse. It has been considered as 
one of the priorities of health and treatment issues in different 
countries of the world. The purpose of the present study is to 
investigate the program of psychological interventions with a robot on 
the sexual care of children. The results showed that psychological 
interventions with robots are effective on children's sexual care. The 
prevention program is to prevent sexual victimization of children by 
helping them learn skills to protect themselves and teach them to 
recognize good and bad contact and seek a trusted adult for help and can
 be considered as a treatment method by counselors and psychologists.

","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

forks.title: Robot-based psychological intervention program for the prevention of child sexual abuse

creator.name: Mohammad Tahan
creator.affiliation: Department of Psychology and Exceptional Children Education, University of Tehran, Tehran

steps.section: A Summary of the Content of the Program of Psychological Intervention with Robot for Sexual Care in Children
A Summary of the Content of the Program of Psychological Intervention with Robot for Sexual Care in Children
steps.step:
{"blocks":[{"key":"3vrrr","text":"Introducing and explaining the body parts:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"scf2","text":"
The therapist first talks briefly about the body parts and the way each part is capable of performing a series of tasks. Various
parts from head to toe are then described to the children by the robot as their functioning.


Task:  Displaying the photo of a girl/boy's body Writing the name of each body part separately, coloring it, and talking about the functioning and efficiency of each one","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":225,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: A Summary of the Content of the Program of Psychological Intervention with Robot for Sexual Care in Children
steps.step:
{"blocks":[{"key":"dhetm","text":"Identifying and gaining knowledge of important parts of the body as well as intimate ones:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8932o","text":"
Therapist:
Describes a body part that is particularly important to other ones in such a way that if they are not available, some parts of the individual's life is disrupted or they are unable to live","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7qcms","text":"
Therapist:
Explains the body parts and the fact that some are personal and no one has the right to look at or touch them except the individual by oneself","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aab5n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4251g","text":"Robot:
Introduces the important body parts, e.g., eyes, hands, legs, head, and abdomen","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7oogh","text":"
Robot: Provides a general introduction of the intimate parts 


Task: Photographing the whole body, separating each body part, naming each part independently, identifying the position of intimate parts, and distinguishing the sensitive and important ones","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":65,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: A Summary of the Content of the Program of Psychological Intervention with Robot for Sexual Care in Children
steps.step:
{"blocks":[{"key":"au8mc","text":"Learning to recognize family members, acquaintances, and strangers:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5t80a","text":"
Therapist:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dj010","text":" An explanation of the people around an individual Who do you know? ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9a02s","text":"
Family 1:
father - mother - sister - brother ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d2rgl","text":"
Family 2:
grandparents - uncle - aunt","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2sd3","text":"
Acquaintances:
neighbors, mother or father's friend, and sibling's friend","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f57ns","text":"
Stranger:
People you do not know","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"790vd","text":"
Robot: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"50qm8","text":"Talks about family members, acquaintances, and strangers and tells the difference between them


Task: Displaying the photos of family members, acquaintances, strangers - a photo of a hypothetical person, family introduction, as well as getting to know acquaintances and strangers, and identification of the person in each of the sections","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":97,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: A Summary of the Content of the Program of Psychological Intervention with Robot for Sexual Care in Children
steps.step:
{"blocks":[{"key":"ak09s","text":"Learning how to communicate with family members, acquaintances, and strangers:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bipsa","text":"
Therapist:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9hl09","text":"Explains how individuals relate to those around them. To what extent?","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d74eo","text":"Explaining and introducing interactions with others, how to communicate with them, and the type of communication with others (touch, sight, and talking)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2g62f","text":"
Robot: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8j1o3","text":"Explains how to communicate properly with family members, acquaintances, and strangers (how to communicate by touch, sight, and talking with family members, acquaintances, and strangers)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fuhph","text":"
Task:  Displaying the photo of how a person communicates with family members, acquaintances, and strangers","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":1,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: A Summary of the Content of the Program of Psychological Intervention with Robot for Sexual Care in Children
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"c57dc","text":"Diagnosing risky and traumatic situations and moments:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"23un8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b4ldo","text":"Therapist: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7mfja","text":"A brief description of the moments and situations that can occur to anyone","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6drpe","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"auia4","text":"The robot fully explains these moments:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4mjm5","text":"Family:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ocn3","text":"Being alone at home and the situations that may arise in terms of touch, sight, and talking ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1h3gn","text":"Acquaintances and strangers:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3jcb2","text":"Situations that may take place outside the home","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ee6i9","text":"Conditions noticed by children: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3h6m9","text":"Showing dissatisfaction with some actions, and having prolonged and frequent upsetting situations leading to disgust","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8r4o7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1eaf5","text":"Task: Displaying the photos of dangerous, sensitive moments - family members, acquaintances, and strangers","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
